HODL

21Shares Crypto Basket Index ETP

The world's first crypto index exchange-traded product (ETP)

product documents
Data as of May 6, 2021
Fact Sheet
Index Guide
Prospectus
Final Terms
KID
Share on Twitter

Description

The 21Shares Crypto Basket Index ETP (ticker: HODL) seeks to track the investment results of an index composed of top 5 crypto currencies ranked by market capitalization.

Objective

The 21Shares Crypto Basket Index ETP (HODL) seeks to capture evolution of large cap crypto market.

Securitization

21Shares ETP is accessible like stocks on a major exchange with no special set up needed.

Buy the Market

Exposure to 75% of the crypto assets market that rebalances monthly to follow the evolution of the crypto space.

Collateralization

21Shares holds the underlying crypto assets in cold storage equal to 100% of the value of the notes at all times.

Safety

Institutional grade security and custody solution using a variety of safety measures including cold-storage, multiple private keys, whitelisting and audit trails.
